required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Inpatient Screening Mammography for Non-adherent and High Risk Women
clinical_study.official_title: Inpatient Screening Mammography for Non-adherent and High Risk Women

collaborator.agency: EQUIP (Excellence in Quality, Utilization of resources, Integration and Patient- centered Care)

brief_summary.textblock: The investigators propose to pilot a program that will evaluate the feasibility of an inpatient screening mammography for non-adherent and high risk hospitalized women age 52-74 admitted to the medicine services at Johns Hopkins Bayview Medical Center and Howard County General Hospital. The two key activities include: inpatient breast care education with educational handouts and offering inpatient screening mammography. Inpatient screening mammography will be offered to non-adherent (last screening mammogram more than 24 months ago) and high risk (Gail 5-year risk of breast cancer 1.6 or greater) women. This pilot program will thus evaluate the feasibility of an inpatient screening mammography as an innovative approach to increase breast cancer screening among non-adherent and high risk women.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of women who underwent a screening mammography during hospitalization
primary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to hospital discharge, up to 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Screening mammography is done during hospitalization. Proportion of women that get the screening will be assessed.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Inpatient screening mammography for non-adherent and high risk
arm_group.description: All non-adherent women were offered inpatient screening mammography during hospitalization

intervention.description: The purpose of the study was to evaluate the feasibility of securing inpatient breast cancer screening mammograms for non-adherent hospitalized women prior to hospital discharge.
intervention.arm_group_label: Inpatient screening mammography for non-adherent and high risk

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- women between 50 and 74 years of age who were non-adherent to breast screening guidelines
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with a history of breast cancer or mastectomy
- history of other cancers (except skin)
- serious comorbidities making patient's life expectancy <10 years

eligibility.gender_description: women between 50 and 74 years of age who were non-adherent to breast screening guidelines (USPSTF recommendations)
